function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of the non-dominated sorting genetic algorithm II (NSGA-II) with adjustable parameters for optimization","Impact":"Inefficient optimization and poor performance of the algorithm","Mitigation":"Performing multiple simulations to determine optimum values for parameters","Technologies":"Optimization algorithms, simulation tools","People":"Researchers, engineers, or individuals using NSGA-II for optimization","Owner":"Research institutions, engineering firms, individuals"},{"Description":"Calculation of virus infection risk in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in the building","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce virus quanta concentration, exposed time of occupants, and inhalation rate; improving ventilation systems and air filtration","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration, occupancy monitoring","People":"Building occupants, public health officials, facilities management","Owner":"Facilities management, public health organizations"}]}
